entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 3:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Temperature: -28.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.6°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
